title: [Iceblossom Glade]
description: A ring of fragrant, snow-covered cedars holds the rest of the woods at bay, forming a large glade with a path leading deep into the southerly woods.  Iceblossoms, vibrant winterberries, and bright yellow aconite brighten the area, and snow blankets a merry-go-round in the middle of the glade.  A few buildings can be reached through neatly cleared paths in the snow.
